tooltip.clientstorage.custom_delay:
This is the delay in milliseconds
between each packet sent to the server.
Useful if you are using a Spigot (or forked)
server and mod doesn't open a crafting menu.
tooltip.clientstorage.threshold:
How many packets can
be sent at once.
tooltip.clientstorage.inform_server_type:
Different servers
(Vanilla, Fabric, Spigot, Paper, Purpur etc.)
have different packet settings.
If you want to be informed about the detected
server type, set this to true.
error.clientstorage.unknown_server: Server type %s is unknown. Please set appropriate packet delay in config.
